title: Tristana animation bug
body: Tristanas weapon sticks to her hand when doing /joke /taunt /dance /laugh{{champion:18}}

replies.body:
Hey efty,

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!

It's like one vertex, isn't it? I thought I was the only one who saw that, and then I went on Lolking and looked at the same animation, but it's fine there.

For me, a vertex from Riot Girl Tristana's left pant leg is sticking to her hand.
